createNFTCollection(string,string).details: first we import the contract's bytecode to deploy, then we make a salt on the _artistName and we use assembly to generate a collection address for an ERC721 contract return the newly generated collection address

params._artistName: the name of the collection artist
params._artistSymbol: the name of the collection symbol

returns.collectionAddress: the address of the created collection contract

createNFTCollection(string,string).notice: creates the ERC-721 Collection contract address so he can mints NFTs in it afterwards
